mapper.sql: id, pipe_id, provider_kind, status, sha_local, ref_id, cost_time, track_type, track_id, annex, remark, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, del_flag
h.id, h.pipe_id, h.provider_kind, h.status, h.sha_local, h.ref_id, h.cost_time, h.track_type, h.track_id, h.annex, h.remark, h.create_date, h.create_by, h.update_date, h.update_by, h.del_flag
mapper.select: select ,p.pipe_name,c.name cluster_name from ci_pipe_history h left join ci_pipeline p on p.id=h.pipe_id left join app_cluster c on p.cluster_id=c.id where h.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into ci_pipe_history (id, pipe_id, provider_kind, status, sha_local, ref_id, cost_time, track_type, track_id, annex, remark, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, del_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pipeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{providerKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shaLocal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{costTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{trackType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trackId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{annex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update ci_pipe_history
pipe_id = #{pipeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
provider_kind = #{providerKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sha_local = #{shaLocal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ref_id = #{refId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cost_time = #{costTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
track_type = #{trackType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
track_id = #{trackId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
annex = #{annex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ci_pipe_history set pipe_id = #{pipeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, provider_kind = #{providerKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sha_local = #{shaLocal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ref_id = #{refId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cost_time = #{costTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, track_type = #{trackType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, track_id = #{trackId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, annex = #{annex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select ,p.pipe_name,c.name cluster_name,u.user_name create_by_name from ci_pipe_history h left join ci_pipeline p on p.id=h.pipe_id left join app_cluster c on p.cluster_id=c.id left join sys_user u on u.id = h.create_by where h.del_flag!=1
AND p.pipe_name LIKE CONCAT('%','${pipeName}','%')
AND h.environment = #{environment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND h.provider_kind = #{providerKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND c.name LIKE CONCAT('%','${clusterName}','%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(h.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AND DATE_FORMAT(h.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
order by h.create_date desc
